title: One Piece Episode 352 Recap
author: [swim squad]

title: 352 & 353: 'A Belief Worth Begging to Live for!! Brook Defends His Afro' and 'A Man's Promise Never Dies!!'

title: Shimotsuki Ryuma - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Comprehensive character information for Ryuma including his legendary status as a dragon-slaying samurai from Wano Country, his history, and his zombie form animated by Brook's shadow. Used for character profile data and understanding his significance.

title: Oars - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Detailed information about Oars the Continent-Puller, his status as a 500-year-old ancient giant zombie, and how Moria's insertion of Luffy's shadow gave him Luffy's personality, dreams, and muscle memory for techniques.

title: Jungle P - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about Opening 9 'Jungle P' by 5050, including episode range (326-372), release date (November 7, 2007), and significance as the first opening featuring the Thousand Sunny and Franky as a crew member. Brook also appears but isn't yet revealed as a crew member.

title: One Piece Music - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about One Piece music including the fact that ending themes were discontinued from episode 279 onward, with opening themes extended from 110 seconds to 150 seconds to compensate. Episode 352 follows this format with no ending theme.

title: Thriller Bark Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Comprehensive arc information providing context for Episode 352 within the larger Thriller Bark narrative. Details about zombie mechanics, salt weakness, and the arc's major events.

title: Brook Voice - One Piece (TV Show) - Behind The Voice Actors
author: Behind The Voice Actors
notes: Voice actor information for Brook: Chō (Shigeru Nagashima) in Japanese and Ian Sinclair in English. Also noted that Chō voices both Brook and Ryuma in this episode, creating a unique situation.
